name: Bokeh LD43 Post Jam
description:
Bokeh is a musical shooter. Fight but keep your rhythm. Die beautifully. 72 weapons to get too. I am a lover of code breaking and the code here is one button to fire all 72, based on a 4 beat loop. Half and full beat hits trigger weapons, hit the off beat and it all turns off and you have to start again.

Play the practice mode to start with as it has instructions. Once you have your head round it play the 1 player mode or challenge a friend.

The theme was Sacrifices must be made. Each shot sacrifices HP - but you can get it back if you are canny.

Enjoy
